website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful and unique privacy film in a stained glass design. Allows light in, conserves privacy, looks great.
pros: Stands out for its unusual and attractive floral stained glass design
Helps eliminate UV rays into your home
Wet application makes this film easy to install
cons: Some users report imperfections in the print of the film

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described! This window film is beautiful! My only suggestion is to the installation instructions--cut it to exactly the size of your window as cutting it once it's on can be tough. But other than that, it's perfect!! I used it on an old window to hang on the wall with fairy lights behind it. The picture does the actual result zero justice. The colors are off in the photo, but it's truly lovely!
customer_reviews.author: -m-

customer_reviews.title: great privacy paper for my front door
customer_reviews.text: great privacy paper for my front door. when light shines from outside it gives iff vibrant colors. good quality.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan imeltchouk

customer_reviews.title: Want a pretty window? You have to try this!
customer_reviews.text: Just look how pretty that looks! Let’s light in and gives you privacy and a beautiful window! Even looks beautiful at night, my outside door light makes it a pretty picture inside in the dark room. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma N

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Used to on our back porch door window to block light. Works great! Its not sticky like I thought it would be but it worked great!! Easy to apply just spray water on window and then get the air bubbles out. I did not buy the kit to help apply. I used a spray bottle and a credit card.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful privacy option!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because it gave me privacy in a beautiful way! Students and colleagues will look into my office door window when I’m trying to prep for my class, so I put this up to prevent them from looking in and “expecting” me to open the door. So easy to install. I measured what was needed and cut with regular scissors. Then I peeled off the backing and adhered to my window. I needed to readjust and lifting up was easy; it didn’t tear. Once I smoothed it out, it cling just fine from the readjustment. Beautiful stained glass look and it has hung with no problem on my door for months!! Big fan and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: blocks sun & gives pop of color
customer_reviews.text: this film was for south facing door to back porch - i wanted something other than tinted plain film. i cut it in 3 sections because it was about a foot short & i wasn’t buying a new roll. product is great & what i expected
customer_reviews.author: robert wedgeworth

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: After doing my large window with a different window film I had no issues putting up the stained glass. I did buy the instillation kit with the films. It’s really pretty when the sun comes through. Happy my neighbors can’t see in my house when driving down the street and can leave my curtains open.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. It sticks good to the plexiglass I have over he window on my back door and looks nice. The only thing was that it was a little hard to match up the pattern. I ended up having to cut it in an odd spot and ended up with a couple smaller pieces which is going to make using that a little difficult. I would definitely buy again though.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It’s so beautiful! I am in love with this pattern. It was easy to install, a little tedious peeling the film off. Just takes a little patience. I am not a professional and if I can do it, I would assume most everyone else can too. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: sheetmetalmama

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful. Easy to just spray on water and apply to window.
customer_reviews.author: melchambers

customer_reviews.title: This is PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because my small bathroom was so dark with the blinds. We have neighbors close, so we can't open the blind without them looking at the toilet!! It was super easy to put up! We have put up the one way film before and this is definitely way easier. It makes this small room brighter and actually inviting! I only wish the pictures showed how really nice it is! What a surprise for $10!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Shulsen

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS. Put it up over my shower window and it looks so pretty when the sun shines through. Added a perfect touch to my bathroom for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Really Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: We recently had a screened porch built and in order to provide us with a little privacy, I bought an old window, cleaned it up and covered the glass with this. It looks very nice, catches the sun and does afford us some privacy. It is a great product for small things but I think maybe too much of it could be very "busy."
customer_reviews.author: sandb365

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, functional, easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: We love it. It's pretty, still allows for some light to get in so it's not dark and now, and prevent our "security guard" dogs from freaking out and jumping at the window every time they see a leaf blow across the yard or somebody walking down the street with their dog, which was our primary reason for buying it. Needless to say, are dogs don't fight care for it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Robb

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this privacy screen. You cannot see out of it or through it from the outside. I was able to apply it myself, it just took a bit of time to measure and accurately apply it. I would recommend getting help from another person if you want it to be as near perfect as you can get it. I love this film because it does what it is supposed to do AND it looks beautiful! It is like have a work of art in my kitchen. This is perfect for me because I live in an apartment with a lot of windows so I needed a fix that would be inexpensive but that would still allow light in.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to Install, looks great, and provide lots of privacy without having to cover up the window with a dark curtain so I still get natural daylight in my bathroom! The hardest part for me was trying to separate the backing. When you first start it's hard to get the corner started haha
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Drown, Realtor

customer_reviews.title: Works well, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: We used the film to provide privacy for our daughter with autism. She doesn’t seem to mind it. She was bothered by fluttering curtains and kept removing them.
customer_reviews.author: DWynkoop

customer_reviews.title: Good product g
customer_reviews.text: Easy on and off, pretty, worked great on my hutch doors for the privacy I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon O

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, pretty, and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you wipe the window down with a little water before you apply it. I couldn't get it to stick at first and then read the instructions like an adult. Now it works perfectly, blocks people from staring into my front window, and looks so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty privacy protection and light-blocking film
customer_reviews.text: I live in a house in the South that faces west, so the sun comes in the back windows before noon and the front windows after noon. It was so hot all day that my air conditioner didn't stop running, but the house still wasn't cool. I didn't want blackout film everywhere, but I needed a solution. This has lowered my light bill because my air conditioner actually works, and it's made my house more comfortable. It's pretty, too. I paid about $50 to cover my windows, and it's saved me that much a month.
customer_reviews.author: Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This product looks and works great. It's super easy to install. You cannot see in or out ant any time of the day yet it still allows a lot of light in. When the sun hits it just right it sparkles really nicely. Pictures are from the inside and outside during the day. I checked at night with the lights on inside from outside and you can't see inside at all. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: shain

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: We put this on a skylight in our kitchen , looks great and easy to put on. We were getting too much sun to be in the kitchen certain times of the day, blocks a lot of the sun and keeps the kitchen a little cooler. Will probably get one for another skylight. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for decorating and providing privacy without sacrificing the light
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to get privacy from your window without sacrificing the light. We installed this in a transom window above our slider door. It faced the afternoon sun and made our dinner uncomfortable because the sun would shine in our eyes as we ate. This solved the problem! We no longer get the direct sun, but we do get the light and it looks amazing. Almost like we have had a stained glass window installed! It was easy to measure and very easy to install. Also, it can be removed and reused so we have also purchased a different pattern as well to have a variety as the seasons change.
customer_reviews.author: Curl up with a book

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, sticks well
customer_reviews.text: Bought twice because I messed it up the first time. I have large bathroom windows. My house USED to be surrounded by woods. Now, there is a development right behind me. The people behind my have a straight view directly into my shower! I got these and they work well. I take SCALDING hot, SUPER long showers. Not peeling up with humidity in the bathroom. They are beautiful and once I got them on properly, look great. Probably better for smaller windows, or ones with panes, mine is just one huge window, so it was a little harder to install. I just used windex and a credit card.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product that works!
customer_reviews.text: Cutting this item to the size of my window was the hardest part. One thing I dont like about it is that it doesnt block out sunlight at all. I guess you can buy black ones for that purpose. Other than that it's perfect and beautiful. Really good for privacy. It has been up for several months and is staying completely in place.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Easy! Quick! Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Installs easily in minutes. Easy to adjust if applied improperly, no mess, no stickiness, great privacy protection! Love the colors and design, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: lindsay k

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the pattern and the role was just enough to cover the windows on my carport door and I was able to use the scraps to accent a few Windows on my French doors. Apparently I had a hard time comprehending the directions because I kept trying to stick it on and cut it but I had never moved the plastic backing. LOL figured it out, and had to get over the fact that it wasn't cut perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie V.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Curtain Alternative
customer_reviews.text: Lovely and perfect for windows that you don't want to or can't put curtains on. We used it on the glass cut out on our front door for more privacy and works like a charm and adds something interesting!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquilyn

customer_reviews.title: As Pretty as Stained Glass!
customer_reviews.text: I use this On the lower half of the bathroom window for privacy, and it looks lovely. It is not difficult to install, but it does take care. Measuring correctly is crucial.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this window cling. It was just what I was expecting. It had a few tiny ink spots but since I bought it for my classroom, I didn't care.
customer_reviews.author: Wingshadow. Farm

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors
customer_reviews.text: Went great with paint color. Went on easy, more water you use, the easier it is to adjust. It's been a couple days since I applied it, and it's still on glass.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I've used Artscape and this brand. This one goes on okay. The back sticker very difficult to remove. It stays on well. The quality misses the mark. It does not look like the picture. You can tell it's a sticker. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about getting this wrong, but following the directions everything worked out. It sure is pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good i use it covering my skylight to cut some of the suns rays
customer_reviews.author: Pudgy Pugliese

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. Fairly easy to adhere to the window. The best part is that unlike contact paper you can kind of slide out the bubbles or wrinkles because it's just water not glue. My only complaint is that I wish the backing of this was like wrapping paper or contact paper where it had a grid. I had to cut along the long edge and had some user errors.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Jane

customer_reviews.title: Love the Design
customer_reviews.text: Great window privacy! I loved the blue and the design. Easy to install and remove. I used this for my bathroom door that is also connected to the exit of the house. Great privacy and I used it for both the inside and outside. The pictures attach show how it looks with the bathroom light on, bathroom light off, and the view from the outside looking in.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Easy and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of skeptical of how well this would hold up. And what it really would look like on the windows. But it is really pretty and it's so easy to apply to the windows.
customer_reviews.author: Annamarie

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: I used them on intables that have glass doors so everyone cant see my junk inside it works great
customer_reviews.author: old_bat

customer_reviews.title: Great screen
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I used lots of water and flattened/spread with an oversized ruler to wick the water out from underneath and have no bubbles at all. The material is easy to work work with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty... one one side
customer_reviews.text: This is one sided. It's very vibrant and beautiful on the interior side. The exterior side is very muted, which is really disappointing considering I bought it for the beautiful vibrancy and wanted to be able to enjoy it on the outside as well because my door is teal blue, and I bought it to go in the door windows - the exterior side is pastel and too light. But it works as a privacy film and again, it's very nice inside the house.
customer_reviews.author: J. L.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you order enough of the material to complete project
customer_reviews.text: Very easy aplication. Love how it still lets light in but at the same time keeping your privacy 100% complete.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Came today I didn’t expect it to be very good due to some of the review , but the one I received was amazing a very nice Vinyl went up very easy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The colors are bright and vivid and it has a beautiful floral pattern
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful floral pattern and it sticks much better than I'd expected it to.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love how it won’t get dusty like blinds or curtains. Mom said it reminds her of church windows. I think it’s beautiful! I mistakenly purchased one roll from a different company and the blue doesn’t quite match but other than that it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lacie

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T INCLUDE TOOLS
customer_reviews.text: I'm very upset that this didn't come with the installation kit shown in the video, described in the instructions, and mentioned in the reviews. If you're not going to include the proper specialty tools to install, you should really make that clear in your product description. Most people don't have vinyl squeegees just laying around. Very upset that I now have to spend more money and pack up this project for another day.
customer_reviews.author: Carrot Vixen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install, and this coming from someone who mucks up just installing screen protectors on phones. Just measure, cut, spray water, peel backing, and place. I used a rotary cutter and cutting mat, that I already had, and that helped keep everything straight.
customer_reviews.author: Summer W

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good, Easy enough to install. Blocks sun coming through in the afternoons,
customer_reviews.text: Looks Good, Easy enough to install. Blocks sun coming through in the afternoons, Looks great at night with porch light on. It glows from the inside and looks great from the outside too. Wife works at home and her chair where she is using her laptop gets bleached out when the afternoon sun comes through the front window. I bought this and installed it for her as a surprise, She loves the looks and the sun filtering. Hopefully it will last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Coverage
customer_reviews.text: It was relatively easy to install. It covered the area I wished very well
customer_reviews.author: Aris

customer_reviews.title: Looks gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Not see through at all, and it looks beautiful! Light looks real pretty through the windows.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie K.

customer_reviews.title: Vinyl window decorative covering
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased a home with 2 side windows on the side of the door. I could not find curtains to cover the area so I decided to cover the inserts with the vinyl decorative window covering. They look beautiful and elegant and blend with the decor in my family room. I also put some in the bathroom window for privacy and elegance. Have used it several times and the results is always amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Randall

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install & beautiful. Let's light in beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to work with and install. It looks beautiful!!!!
customer_reviews.author: lds247ru2

customer_reviews.title: Adds character to any home.
customer_reviews.text: Love how the light shines through it. Great privacy both day and night. Going to do more rooms for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. If I'd been putting it on a square or rectangular window, it would have been a breeze. I used it for two fan-shaped windows at the top of my front doors. The curves were challenging (made a template), but it was so worth it! I wish I'd known about this sooner. It applies with water with a a little dish soap on the glass. Private and very pretty. Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Book Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Measure twice and cut once
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my bathroom and during the day my bathroom appears to be blue. It’s a thick vinyl and easy to cut and reuse. For some reason I came up short even though I cut according to the size of the window. I propped the vinyl with the paper backing on the window and marked where to cut but it come up short. Best to cut slightly bigger then trim as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Arbil

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Used for my front screen door, easy to place on the Glass. And so beautiful always getting complements.
customer_reviews.author: #1Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not printed on both sides
customer_reviews.text: Only printed on one side, while the other side looks white. You can tell when looking at opposite side of printing that it's one sided. Looks good on the side it's printed on, but if you look from outside it looks like whiter, defeating the purpose of a stained glass appearance. Also, although area was prepped properly some areas do not adhere properly to glass. Would not really recommend it...
customer_reviews.author: Nanci

customer_reviews.title: Great , fun product to spruce up your curb appeal!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to cover my garage door windows. It was sooo Easy to install. The Material is stretchy so make sure you have a sharp xacto knife to cut properly. Clings easy with water. It’s been on my garage now for over a month and looks great still. I was afraid the sun setting on it daily would cause problems but so far so good!!! Makes my house look so much nicer.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER SIMMS

customer_reviews.title: You can do a partial window, we did vertical halves on front french doors, the edge remains adhered and looks amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, decreases brightness, affords privacy, beautiful... we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kariel

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. My advice would be to cut it about 1/2" or so large on each side, fit the piece into a corner of the window so that two sides are installed tight to the frame and then trim the other sides with a razor blade. This way you should get an overall tight installation.
customer_reviews.author: JBGoode

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Private!
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice-looking and adds a high degree of privacy. I would recommend this to anyone interested in privacy film with a floral pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to fill up some windows on this little window door in my basement, not sure what the little door is for but it was super dark and kind of creepy when you look in it so I wanted to put a window film on it to look pretty and maybe put some white lights behind it to make it light up, and so far I love it so much! It was easy to use and I still have a bunch left over. Definitely will buy it again for more projects =)
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Minor printing errors, but looks great for the price
customer_reviews.text: There were some odd discolorations and blotches in the printing, which would have been a little disappointing if I'd wanted to use this film in a prominent location. It's perfectly ok on my bathroom window, though. It wasn't any harder to install than any other window film I've used. It's only been up for a day, so I don't know how it will hold up long term, but it looks great for now.
customer_reviews.author: Pants

customer_reviews.title: Nice accents that still let the light in
customer_reviews.text: I used the window film on some smallish decorative windows in my living room. They added a really nice decorative touch without ruining the natural light I got through these windows. I'm not sure I'd use them to cover an entire sliding glass door as it would be a bit much. But they'd be nice to cover the lower panes of a full-sized window or a glass shower for privacy if the design accents your current decor. The film was easy to apply but remember: measure twice, cut once!! And make sure you get the correct width for whatever you're going to cover with this film.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Buckley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. allows light in while giving privacy. Only 2 things keeping it from 5 stars. First, it has a hazy frosted look on the outside of the window. I rather it look the same as the inside. Second, you cannot match a seam on larger windows that take 2 rows. The print will not line up correctly and the seam is easily seen.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: wonderful solution, patience necessary
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. Before we owned our home, an addition was built. The bathroom window was left untouched. There is a clear line of sight from our sunroom to the half bath. I wanted to keep the natural light without the awkward eye contact. This product is the perfect solution. Many of our guests have thought it was actually stained glass. Tedious to perfectly cut and apply on sectioned windows. Astronomically chapter than buying and installing an actual stained glass window.
customer_reviews.author: The VF Ladies

customer_reviews.title: Just as pretty if not prettier in person!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this! Is absolutely gorgeous!!!!!!!! I had originally ordered it for the window on our camper door, but due to the fact the inside of the window is not a smooth surface, adhesion to the window was an epic fail. Results, we are currently updating a 2007 bumper pull, swapping the couch and dining around, added the cling to the window where the dinning table will be, so only 80% went to waste!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Raines

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two do one of my windows. I couldn’t believe how easy they were to install! They are beautiful and have not came off my windows! I ended up buying a lot more! I have done 4 windows in my kitchen and got a different design for my sons room and did three windows! ( we have a lot of windows) I’ll be doing one in my daughters room and probably 2 in my laundry room!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cano

customer_reviews.title: Made ALL the difference!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this window cling. It blocks out all of the unwanted while still letting in all of the light. Plus it is quite beautiful IMO. The most challenging part is the cutting and centering but that's just a matter of how much time you have and how picky you are. It worked out great for me and I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: twiggy2theinfinitepower

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, private, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases for my apartment. I have a lot of windows, terrible blinds, and it gets very hot. These dramatically lowered the temperature in my apartment, look beautiful, let in a beautiful glowing light, and give me privacy. They're easy to put up - the hardest part for me was cutting it straight with scissors. This is a personal issue, not a product issue, and I ended up using a paper cutter for my last bit with good results.
customer_reviews.author: TeacupsNTextbooks

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and did what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little tricky to get the clear film off the back but accomplished the end result on the projects I was doing. Very happy with the overall result.
customer_reviews.author: H Mek

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and perfect for the job!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the lower half of my bathroom window. It’s absolutely gorgeous! The colours are lovely even when it’s dark and amazing when it’s sunny. Absolutely 100% privacy. A little bit tricky to install but has enough elasticity to still move it a bit afterwards. Who builds a house where you can wave at the neighbours while sitting on the throne anyway? In any event, this has solved the problem beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Davisa5

customer_reviews.title: Win win in the vinyl cling
customer_reviews.text: I have an amazing design within the glass panel on my door, but when the sun is in the west it magnifies the sunbeams and it's so bright you can't sit in the room. So I decided to try this film on the inside. And it enhances the outside view of the door. I love it so much, now I only need to find the brightest white to paint the door. Winner here!
customer_reviews.author: D Green

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors/pattern - fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is nice, but color is darker than picture shows. I used to cover a fireplace glass door, because we do not use it, maybe that is why it turned out much darker than the picture. I will try on a real window next time. The plastic is very thick. Use enough water on the glass and it will stick without any issues! Gorgeous white lilies. Shipped very fast too, even without Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: anakonda

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: The film is very nice. It is a heavy film so easy to apply. It if opaque just as it appears in the photo. I was able to apply it to my window with no issues. I did by the application kit, it may not be necessary but it was convent to have the proper tools in the proper size for the job. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because the pattern does not repeat regularly like wall paper so covering a window with multiple rolls is not easy.
customer_reviews.author: Rivka

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love my new found privacy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! Recently, I had someone show up to my house in the middle of the night and was banging on my door. I hated that they could see in to my home and see that I was home alone. This has solved my problem!! I only wish I had discovered them sooner!! Took me longer to clean the window than to install. Easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Avila

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful but will cost you time to make it perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very beautiful and looks expensive .i Have five window need to be done. I’m so impressed with the quality but to cut it the right size for me wasn’t easy at all . After all I’m so glad I ordered it .
customer_reviews.author: Rehaboth

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to remove all backing!! Lol
customer_reviews.text: I would like to say, I was very upset at first because I couldn’t get it to stick to my window! Lol I’m slow, there is like a double clear backing to this, so when you think it doesn’t have anymore backing, check it because it does! When all the backing is removed it is very limp and staticky, and it will stick to itself. After you remove all of the backing(s) it’s the easiest to apply, there’s really no need for a squeegee or anything else a cloth will work. I love this because it’s not see through, but it lets in sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: The pattern is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift so I am not sure of the quality or the ease in putting it up; however, I did look at the pattern and it is quite lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great for two years then.......
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to cut, install, and get on the window. Worked like a champ and looked pretty good. Unfortunately, the east facing window in the desert gets a lot of morning sun. A lot. And the window cling started off-gassing and emitting a cooking, plastic type odor. Peeled it off (took a couple of seconds). So now I'm debating to buy another, full well knowing it will last a 18 months or so before it becomes too smelly.
customer_reviews.author: Rich in LV

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Totally perfect. I didn’t want a curtain on my door but I didn’t want the neighbors looking in either. Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Can’t see through it but will still allow plenty of natural light in. Neighbor even loves it
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: This is very pretty and easy to apply. It blocks sunlight but still allows plenty in to light up the room. It allows a ton of privacy as you cannot see in or out of the window with this film on it.
customer_reviews.author: db4kb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for privacy
customer_reviews.text: Our window looks at our neighbors driveway about 15’ away, so this is an awesome solution
customer_reviews.author: WoofMom

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Looks lovely.
customer_reviews.text: The hardest part, as with any home project, is measuring and cutting a straight line. After that, it was very easy to install. Rarely, some of the film would flip backwards, but I think that was due to an extreme change in temperature we had one weekend. I am very happy with the product and will buy it again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L

customer_reviews.title: Window privacy decal
customer_reviews.text: I was very unhappy with this product. It would not stick in no possible way to my windows. I had to use tape which I will take down cause it looks tacky. I have used products like these on the same windows but this one had no stick to it. It was also so hard to peel apart. It was not worth the headaches.
customer_reviews.author: rocky

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great took some work to get it up, but it was good!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Prettier up than it appears on the roll! The only improvement I would make is to have grid lines on the back for easier measuring and cutting.
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: Nice window treatment
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid this might be hard to use, but it wasn’t. Used it on the rear window of the motor home where we do not look out. Nice when traveling and eliminated clanking of blinds.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Turner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Can’t line up. Only printed on one side so other side is foggy. The edges are all popping up. I’m going to order something else and throw this one away. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Nona Lani

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on the window
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on the window, and is easy to cut to size. I used a scissors and guess-timated, but I recommend getting an x-acto knife to trim it once it's on the window, I think it would have given me a better result. Still, I'm quiet happy with the way it looks, and the amount of light it lets through without being see through.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but not very bright.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Cut half inch or so oversize. I cut before I tried to install it. Spray water generously on window, place film on window & peel back off. Use credit card or use squeegee to get rid of bubbles & smooth out. It looks nice but isn’t very bright. Backside on glass very pale. I was hoping it looked translucent & bright on both sides. Even so, definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Wicklund

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty! I have two doors in my classroom that I wanted the windows covered on. One roll covered both doors and was very easy to install. I used a ruler, pen and xacto knife. One tip - make sure you use a generous amount of water, it makes it easier to slide the film around if you need to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie W. Toohey

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This window film is great! It is easy to put on and forgiving if you don’t put it on right the first time. Use lots of water! It makes it stick better.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa zindroski

customer_reviews.title: Installation was easy, get the window really wet and smooth into ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived faster than I anticipated - definite plus. Installation was easy, get the window really wet and smooth into place. No problems with air bubbles. I used this on the side lights on each side of the front door and it looks beautiful!! Will be ordering more for the bathroom window. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MeandMissDaisy

customer_reviews.title: Looks good....for about 5 seconds.
customer_reviews.text: First off, save your money. This will stick to your window for about a day and fall off. If you follow instructions to the letter, it still wont hold. The only way tonget this to hold would be glue. And even then I would have my doubts. Go with the tried and true method, curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Lizybeff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I used this window film to replace my old mini blinds that were very difficult to keep clean. It was very easy to install and gives my living room a bright, cheery feel. I love the new look!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good curtain replacement for privacy
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write product reviews but this one was really good. Easy to install, sticks well, and allows a good amount of light inside the bathroom while maintaining privacy. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ayan Halder

customer_reviews.title: Simple Installation
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product! I had three large windows that were extremely weathered. It was either spend thousands to replace, or find a way to save money. It was easy to install. It totally resolved the problem. After finishing 3 windows, I was off by about 1/16th inch on the first one. I simply pulled it down, and re-centered it. The entire process was simple, and all you need is water, a single edge blade, and a towel. It was supposed to be temporary. I get so many compliments, I'm not replacing them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but a pain
customer_reviews.text: Hard to install. Cut pieces kept folding over on themselves. Not wide enough for my windows and impossible to cut another piece to match the pattern. It was difficult also to squeegee out the air bubbles. Had to keep lifting the film off the window and re-sticking it. The pattern is pretty tho.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Armato

customer_reviews.title: Window Treatment Has Never Been This Easy!!
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box and applied to my sliding glass door in just a few minutes. Looks great and no issues. I used a damp cloth to put a little moisture on the glass and just apply to where you want it. It's that easy. I love mine!!

product_meta.title: Coavas Privacy Window Film Stained Glass Window Film Non-Adhesive Frosted Magnolia Glass Film Decorative Static Cling Window Film for Home UV Blocking/Privacy/Heat Insulation 17.5" x 78.7"
feature_bullets: 🌻 Installation Time: in Just Minutes, Install the Window Film Where You Want It to Be.
🌻 Must Do: Remove the backing transparent film, spray with lots of water, scrape out all air bubbles.

Beautiful Pattern Design: The magnolia design can upgrade your home decor, create the look of stained glass and add more beauty to your window and glass door, make your house or office pretty and fashionable.

Excellent Privacy Protection: The privacy level :★★★★★, provides a safe personal space, ensure nobody can see what’s inside your room, while allowing some comfortable natural light in. Perfect for living room, bedroom, bathroom.

Easy to Install and Reusable: No glue, super easy to install and remove without residue. Just prepare a lot of soapy water, scraper, dry towel to install in minutes. If moving the home, just peel off the window film and keep it in a good shape for next use.

Refuse Glare and Strong UV: Avoid glare and keep your eyes comfortable. More Than 96% UV is blocked to protect your skin, prevent heat attack and fading furniture. Keep the home cool in summer and warm in winter, create a comfortable home environment, and save some electricity costs.

Important Tips for You: 🌻The window film size is 17.5 x 78.7 inches, please order the right size according to your needs. 🌻Please don't forget to remove the transparent backing protective film. 🌻If you have any problems, please message us immediately, we have a professional customer service team to help you here.
